Articles.Content: Simply, can we get a 2.5m docking node added to the game, for use with the clamp-o-tron Sr. I've already modded one in myself by rescaling the 1.25m node and it's so much more stable when building stations! No more crazy wobbly stations with their small docking nodes, the 2.5m node actually holds things properly in place. Seems like an obvious, simple and useful addition to the game...
